remarks: A kind of contraposition law that infers an image subclass from a subclass of a preimage.  Raph Levien remarks:  "Likely this could be proved directly, and ~ fvimacnv would be the special case of ` A ` being a singleton, but it works this way round too."  (Contributed by Raph Levien, 20-Nov-2006.)
statement: funimass3 $p |- ( ( Fun F /\ A C_ dom F ) -> ( ( F " A ) C_ B <-> A C_ ( `' F " B ) ) ) $.
